name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proficient Software/Application Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in building scalable solutions utilizing **C#**, **.NET**, and **PowerShell** within Agile development frameworks. My technical expertise extends to creating **RESTful APIs** and integrating **Power Apps** and **Power Automate** to enhance productivity and streamline workflows. I have a strong foundation in cloud technologies, particularly **Microsoft Azure**, and database management with **SQL**.

Additionally, I leverage modern development approaches and practices to deliver high-quality applications. My original strengths include building applications with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, while also spearheading enterprise-grade platforms with AI/ML integration for analytics and automation. My experience in microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and compliance standards includes working on healthcare and financial sector applications, ensuring that they align with regulations such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
